general: Today, dear Sagittarius, the Moon enters Taurus, emphasizing the realm of work in your astrological chart. It is time to define your priorities and reflect on the goals to pursue. Your visionary mind has the potential to conceive ambitious dreams, but it is essential to demonstrate realism and consider what is sustainable for you. This afternoon, with the activation of Mars and Pluto, take the time to adjust your expectations. Tonight, the first quarter of the Moon may lead you into a defensive reflection, so be cautious about whom you share your thoughts with.
love: In your love life, prioritize clear and honest communication. Do not let doubts settle in.
work: Focus on achievable tasks and establish clear priorities to move forward effectively in your projects.
health: Take the time to relax this evening; a good break will help recharge your batteries.
advice: Stay realistic and adjust your ambitions.
teaser: Reevaluate your priorities to move forward serenely.
